extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Shape other)
        Compares this Polygon with the specified shape with respect to their areas.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Shape>
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Shape
        Parameters:
        The - Shape to be compared.
        Returns:
        A negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this object's area is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified object.

      • optimalFit

        public void optimalFit()
        Fits as many as small shapes into the main shape. Regarding to your created composition, this method optimally fits as many as small shapes into outer main shape. Before drawing your composition you certainly must call this method to create the composition.

      • getInnerShape

        public Shape[] getInnerShape()
        Gets the inner shapes.
        Returns:
        Reference of Shape Array.

      • setMainShape

        public void setMainShape​(Shape m)
        Sets the main shape of composition. Main shape is the outer shape and small shapes will be fitted into this shape
        Parameters:
        m - , Main Shape.

      • setSmallShape

        public void setSmallShape​(Shape s)
        Sets the small shape of composition. Small shape is the inner shape and will be fitted into the given main shape
        Parameters:
        s - , Small Shape.
